arStrings.szText: {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|1%|]{/c} of incoming damage is instead suppressed. When you use a {c_important}Defensive{/c}, {c_important}Subterfuge{/c} or a {c_important}Macabre{/c} skill, all suppressed damage is amplified by {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"|%x|]{/c} and explodes, dealing up to {c_random}[Affix_Flat_Value_1]{/c} Fire damage to Nearby enemies.
